summary: A group of friends band together to hide the truth about a mutual friend's tragic death. They soon discover that an evil entity is in pursuit of them.

Daniel|Alex Hardee|Kelly Migdon|Melody Noel|Bill Rainey|Arvilla Riddick|Christine Standfill|Emily Ziegler
keywords: insect in title|animal in title|one word title|monster
title: Mothman
